segments.text: I notice the girl standing near the boy, looking up at him expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be waiting for a cookie, her arm raised towards the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's being quite patient, not trying to climb up herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture is attentive, like she's really hoping to get a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's aware of how dangerous the situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing precariously on the stool, reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nervous for both of them; the stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, completely unaware of what the children are doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own world, not noticing the mischief behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy manages to get down safely without falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be cooperating with him, not making any sudden moves.
segments.speaker: PAR
